title: All Sold: Several 1905-1910s Post Cards: Mathewson, McGinnity, etc.
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: All Sold: Several 1905-1910s Post Cards: Mathewson, McGinnity, etc.
posts.post_content:
Some nice post cards from the Deadball Era. Prices include shipping and are net to me, with PayPal preferred. Please PM me or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or ask any questions. Thanks!

Joe “Iron Man” McGinnity Winthrop Moving Picture Post Card - SOLD
In addition to the photos below, here is a video demo of how this works to show his pitching motion: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBxmDjEtKb8[/url]

Christy Mathewson Flip Book - SOLD
Similar to the McGinnity, but not a post card, rather a small flip book. Operates the same way.

1913 Christy Mathewson RPPC - SOLD
Classic pitching pose of the Giants’ Mathewson on the mound at the Polo Grounds.

1905 Rotograph New York Giants Team by Carl Horner - SOLD

1910s RPPCs of game action at Cleveland’s League Park - SOLD

I'll take the Matty flip book if it's still available.

Thanks!
